      public List<Library> readPlaylists()
      Returns all the playlists excluding the main library.
      Returns:

    • loadAllLibraries

      public List<Library> loadAllLibraries(Path musicFolder, Path userMusicFolder)
      Loads all libraries, starting with the main library, followed by the user-defined playlists.

      This method first loads the main library, which contains all songs available in the default music folder.

      Then, it loads the playlists from the playlists file, if available, and combines both the main library and the playlists into a single list.

      Returns:
      A list containing the main library followed by the playlists. The main library is loaded first, followed by any existing playlists.

    • loadMainLibrary

      public Library loadMainLibrary(Path musicDirectory)
      Loads the main library from the specified music directory.

      This method attempts to load all songs from the provided music directory using the PathRepository. If successful, it returns a new Library object containing all the songs. In case of any IOException, an empty library with a default name ("??library??") is returned as a fallback.

      Parameters:
      musicDirectory - The directory from which to load the songs. This is usually the user's default music folder.
      Returns:
      A Library containing all songs from the specified directory, or an empty library if loading fails due to an IOException.

    • loadUserMainLibrary

      public Library loadUserMainLibrary(Path userMusicFolder)
